alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 9:45AM CDT until April 17 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 945 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Suqualena, or 11 miles west of Meridian, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Meehan and Suqualena around 950 AM CDT. Meridian and Nellieburg around 955 AM CDT. Marion and Savoy around 1005 AM CDT. Zero around 1010 AM CDT. Increase around 1020 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include I 20 Welcome Center At Cuba. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
